title: Please help with font identification URGENTLY <sniff> <sniff></sniff></sniff>
content:
Hi there,

I’ve been told that the font is Cowboy but when looking for Cowboy I get all of the usual suspects that you would find in a country and western.

The font that I am looking for is attached and is used in the logo (Maxwell) on this site: [www.maxwell.co.za](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020545/http:/www.maxwell.co.za/ "www.maxwell.co.za")

Someone please help!!!

Thanks!

Colette

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [maxwell.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020545/http:/typophile.com/files/maxwell.gif) | 10.07 KB |
author: coletteh

comments.content: And see our [FAQ #2](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020545/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2): What do I enter in the title line?

Welcome to Typophile.

[Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020545/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)

Thank you so so so much!!!

Sorry I am new at this and at trying to identify fonts so I had no idea of how to describe it... will try harder next time!

You guys rock!
